title: Rocky Relationship

en: #NAME, you promised you would go rock-climbing with me tonight! I know you're tired, but you did promise. Are you ready to go?

no_caption: I can't. I'm too busy, and I'm too tired...

en: none::Despite your exhaustion, you go rock climbing with Skylar. It pushes you over the edge, and you feel scattered the next day. You don't get much done.
none::Skylar sighs and leaves. You tell yourself you're in the right and ignore the niggling doubt in the back of your mind.
